---
title: "Time series top way_ids"
output: html_notebook

```{r echo=FALSE}
h <- df_superhotedges_april16pt %>% 
  filter( way_id == list_osm_edge[10] ) %>% 
  plot_ly(x= ~time, y= ~(speed*18)/5, color = ~class) %>% 
  layout(title = paste("Time series of speed for way_id",list_osm_edge[10], sep = " " ),yaxis = list(title="Speed (km/h)"),
         xaxis = list(title="Date"))
```

##Averages time x speed for top way_id
```{r echo=FALSE, eval=FALSE}
df_superhotedges_april16pt %>% 
  filter( way_id == list_osm_edge[3] ) %>% 
  group_by(day = day(time)) %>% 
  summarise(speed = mean(speed)) %>% 
  plot_ly(x= ~day, y= ~(speed*18)/5) %>% 
  layout(yaxis = list(title="Speed (km/h)"),
         xaxis = list(title="Date"))

```
